title: Conagra Brands, Inc. Recalls Canned Beef Products Due to Possible Processing Defect
summary: WASHINGTON, July 31, 2019 Conagra Brands, Inc., a Milton, Pa. establishment, is recalling approximately 32,400 pounds of canned beef products due to a potential processing defect, resulting in the potential survival of bacterial pathogens in the products, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and...
impacted_products: Kaskey’s BEEFY MAC PASTA IN TOMATO & MEAT SAUCE
